-- | A simple cache for serving static files in a WAI middleware
--   
@package wai-static-cache
@version 0.1.0.1

module Network.Wai.StaticCache
cacheDir :: FilePath -> IO FileCache
staticfiles :: FileCache -> Middleware
appendCache :: FileCache -> FileCache -> FileCache
instance Show MetaFile
instance Show FileCache
